Jane Lynch Inspired By Simon Cowell For Glee Character. She said: If ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell . Jane Lynch also admitted she is`` amazed'' by the public's reaction to Sue and believes people admire her in the same way they respect music mogul Simon Cowell .
